name: conglomerates are
description:
The game, along with Circuit Breaker, is supposed to test players' knowledge of each other. Those who play can now steal gold from each other, but not when it comes to upgrading their cars.
'The goal is to gather as much car data as possible and gain as much knowledge as possible about each other's cars,' the game's description reads. 'There are three levels in the game: simple car or race track, high-speed track, and buggy track.' The game test players' knowledge of each other's cars, and players who play can now steal gold from each other, but not when it comes to upgrading their cars. The game test players' knowledge of each other's cars, and players who play can now steal gold from each other, but not when it comes to upgrading their cars With the game being developed for mobile devices, it will allow players to switch to a different car at any time to gain different levels of progression. The game is set to be released on August 16 in Russia, and Japan on September 20. For more on Outhouse Media's upcoming titles, check out our September 2017 coverage. NOT SUBSCRIBED TO THE PODCAST?
